pullRequest.body:
This PR restructures a little the noisy tests, exploiting the new `lake` replay feature.

Moreover, it catches previously uncaught noise:
* see #12884 for a noisy file that passes the old CI;
* see #12885 for the same noisy file that does not pass the new CI.

Note that linter warnings and `sorry`s are also not caught by the old CI:
* #12910;
* #12912;
* #12913.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
Let's try it out!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9104554151/job/25028627175)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9104554151/job/25028627493)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9104554151/job/25028627648)

Could you add a comment explaining what this `awk` invocation is doing?

Perhaps also a comment above buildMsgs that explains we are taking advantage of lake's replay.
Comments added: let me know if this is too much/too little!
This is very likely to break in rc2, after Mac is finished with https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/4127. We'll just adapt as needed.

Ok, I'm happy to monitor what needs to be changed with rc2!

As is, CI is not really testing for noisy files anymore.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: new noisy check
